trans-unit.source: Provides basic functionality for controls that display a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"></xref> when a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton"></xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem"></xref>, or <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton"></xref> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 提供显示的控件的基本功能<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"></xref>时<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton"> </xref>， <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem"> </xref>，或<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton"></xref>控件被单击。

trans-unit.source: ToolStripDropDownItem is the abstract base class for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton>, which can host items directly or host additional items in a drop-down container.
trans-unit.target: ToolStripDropDownItem 是为的抽象基类<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton>，这可以托管直接项或主机下拉容器中的其他项。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>

trans-unit.source: You do this by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDown%2A> property to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown> and setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Items%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown>.
trans-unit.target: 执行此操作通过设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDown%2A>属性的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown>和设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Items%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown>属性</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Items%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown></xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDown%2A>

trans-unit.source: Access these drop-down items directly through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDownItems%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 访问直接通过这些下拉列表项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDownItems%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDownItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: You must derive a drop-down control from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem> class in order to have any drop-down functionality for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton> control.
trans-unit.target: 你必须派生从下拉列表控件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem>类使用，以便具有的任何下拉列表功能<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>，或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton>控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"></xref> class with the specified display text, image, and action to take when the drop-down control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"></xref>类具有指定的显示文本、 图像和下拉控件被单击时要执行操作。

trans-unit.source: You must derive a drop-down control from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem> class in order to have any drop-down functionality for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton> control.
trans-unit.target: 你必须派生从下拉列表控件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem>类使用，以便具有的任何下拉列表功能<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>，或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton>控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem>

trans-unit.source: The display text of the drop-down control.
trans-unit.target: 下拉列表控件的显示文本。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> to be displayed on the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref>显示在控件上。

trans-unit.source: The action to take when the drop-down control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 当下拉控件被单击时要执行操作。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"></xref> class with the specified display text, image, and <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> collection that the drop-down control contains.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"></xref>以指定的显示的文本的类图中，和<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref>下拉列表控件包含的集合。

trans-unit.source: You must derive a drop-down control from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem> class in order to have any drop-down functionality for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton> control.
trans-unit.target: 你必须派生从下拉列表控件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem>类使用，以便具有的任何下拉列表功能<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>，或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton>控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem>

trans-unit.target: 下拉列表控件的显示文本。

trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref>显示在控件上。

trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref>下拉列表控件包含的集合。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"></xref> class with the specified display text, image, action to take when the drop-down control is clicked, and control name.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"></xref>与指定的显示文本、 图像、 操作时单击下拉列表控件，并控制名称的类。

trans-unit.target: 下拉列表控件的显示文本。

trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref>显示在控件上。

trans-unit.target: 当下拉控件被单击时要执行操作。

trans-unit.source: The name of the control.
trans-unit.target: 控件的名称。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new accessibility object for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个新的辅助功能对象为<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: A new <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates a generic <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"></xref> for which events can be defined.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个泛型<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"></xref>可以定义有关的事件。

trans-unit.source: The CreateDefaultDropDown method is automatically called if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDown%2A> property finds no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown> associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem>.
trans-unit.target: 如果自动调用 CreateDefaultDropDown 方法的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDown%2A>属性查找<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown>与<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem></xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown>没有</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDown%2A>

trans-unit.source: The created <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 创建<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 释放由非托管的资源<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"> </xref> ，还可以释放托管的资源。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()`method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法称为由公共`Dispose()`方法和<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法。</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()`调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>调用`Dispose`与`disposing`设置为`false`。</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem> references.
trans-unit.target: 当`disposing`参数为 true 时，此方法释放由任何托管对象持有的全部资源此<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem>引用。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 此方法调用`Dispose()`每个引用对象的方法。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要释放托管和非托管资源;<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>若要仅释放非托管的资源。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"></xref> that will be displayed when this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"></xref> is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"></xref>将显示时这<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"></xref>单击。

trans-unit.source: If no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown> is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem>, a call to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.CreateDefaultDropDown%2A> creates a generic drop-down control.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown>与关联<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem>，调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.CreateDefaultDropDown%2A>创建泛型的下拉列表控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.CreateDefaultDropDown%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If a drop-down control is automatically generated, which means that items are added to the collection, and you then set the DropDown property to an explicit drop-down control, you might lose data.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 如果自动生成的下拉列表控件，这意味着，将项添加到集合，且然后将下拉列表中属性设置为显式的下拉列表控件，你可能会丢失数据。

trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"> </xref>关联<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 使用 HideDropDown 方法以防止用户选择对关联的可用选项之一<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown>控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown>

trans-unit.target: 引发<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDownClosed"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将调用事件处理程序，通过委托。

trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The OnDropDownClosed method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: OnDropDownClosed 方法还允许派生的类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 这是处理派生类中的事件的首选的技术。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventArgs>包含事件数据。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventArgs>包含事件数据。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDownItemClicked"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDownItemClicked"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将调用事件处理程序，通过委托。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The OnDropDownItemClicked method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: OnDropDownItemClicked 方法还允许派生的类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 这是处理派生类中的事件的首选的技术。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemClickedEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemClickedEventArgs"> </xref>包含事件数据。

trans-unit.target: 这是处理派生类中的事件的首选的技术。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventArgs>包含事件数据。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raised in response to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.ShowDropDown*> method.
trans-unit.target: 在响应中引发<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.ShowDropDown*>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.ShowDropDown*>

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.

trans-unit.target: OnDropDownShow 方法还允许派生的类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.target: 引发<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.FontChanged"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将调用事件处理程序，通过委托。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.target: OnFontChanged 方法还允许派生的类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.target: 这是处理派生类中的事件的首选的技术。

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventArgs>包含事件数据。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeftChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeftChanged"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventArgs>包含事件数据。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"></xref> is in the pressed state.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"></xref>处于按下状态。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"></xref> is in the pressed state; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"></xref>处于按下状态; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Processes a command key.
trans-unit.target: 处理命令键。

trans-unit.source: This method is called during message preprocessing to handle command keys.
trans-unit.target: 在消息预处理以处理命令键过程中调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: Command keys are keys that always take precedence over regular input keys.
trans-unit.target: 命令键是始终优先于常规输入键的键。

trans-unit.source: Examples of command keys include accelerators and menu shortcuts.
trans-unit.target: 命令键的示例包括快捷键和菜单快捷方式。

trans-unit.source: The method must return `true` to indicate that it has processed the command key, or `false` to indicate that the key is not a command key.
trans-unit.target: 该方法必须返回`true`以指示它已处理命令键，或`false`以指示该密钥不是命令键。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem> implementation of this method calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ProcessCmdKey%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDown%2A> if there are items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDownItems%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem>调用此方法实现<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ProcessCmdKey%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDown%2A>中的项是否<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDownItems%2A>集合。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDownItems%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDown%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ProcessCmdKey%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, this implementation calls the base class implementation.
trans-unit.target: 否则，此实现中调用基类实现。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"></xref>, passed by reference, that represents the window message to process.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"> </xref>，按引用传递，表示要处理的窗口消息。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref> values that represents the key to process.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref>这些值表示要处理的键。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>在所有情况下。

trans-unit.source: Processes a dialog key.
trans-unit.target: 处理对话框键。

trans-unit.source: This method is called during message preprocessing to handle the UP, DOWN, LEFT, RIGHT, ENTER, and SPACEBAR keys in order to navigate the hierarchy of drop-down menus.
trans-unit.target: 在消息上、 下、 左、 右、 enter 键，并按空格键以导航下拉列表菜单的层次结构的键预处理过程中调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref> values that represents the key to process.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref>这些值表示要处理的键。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the key was processed by the item; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果键已由项; 处理否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Displays the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"></xref> control associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 显示<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"></xref>关联与此控件<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Use the ShowDropDown method to display the drop-down controls that have been set by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDown%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: ShowDropDown 方法用于显示设置的下拉列表控件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDown%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDown%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"></xref> is the same as the parent <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"> </xref>与父级相同<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref>。
